products.name: PRE-WORKOUT
products.infoParagraph: Step into the realm of RULE PRE, where energy and focus unite to up your training sessions. Our carefully formulated blend empowers you with an unrivaled energy, enhancing your performance to new heights.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Pre Energy Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: Begin with 1/2 (Half) Scoop of Rule Pre-Workout mixed with 8-10oz of water to assess tolerance. For those accustomed to high stimulants, cautiously increase to 1 LEVEL Scoop before training. Do not surpass 1 serving within 24 hours.

factTitles.title: OTHER INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Natural and Artificial Flavors, Citric Acid, Maltodextrin, Sucralose, Silicon Dioxide, Calcium Silicate, Malic Acid, Acesulfame Potassium.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: This product is designed for use by healthy adults aged 18 and above. Each serving (1 scoop) provides 300mg of caffeine. Do not consume if pregnant, nursing, using nitrates for chest pain, or taking medication for erectile dysfunction (PDE-5 inhibitors).

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: POST-WORKOUT
products.infoParagraph: Dive into the world of RULE POST, where recovery takes center stage. Our carefully crafted formula aids in swift muscle repair and rejuvenation, ensuring your body bounces back stronger after every workout.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Post Swift-Repair Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: Combine 1 scoop of RULE with 8 to 10 fl oz of cold water or your preferred beverage. Consume right after your workout and before going to bed. RULE can also be taken on days when you're not exercising to maintain your Creatine levels. Notable Remark: You can have up to 4 servings of RULE each day. For the initial 5-7 days, go through a loading phase to saturate your cells. Recent research indicates that cycling creatine products isn't necessary and they can be used daily. Take 1 Scoop of RULE: Immediately following intense training or activity, prior to your training session, and on days without training.

factTitles.title: OTHER INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Maltodextrin, Dextrose, Citric Acid, Natural and Artificial Flavors, Silica, Sucralose, and Color Dye.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Allergy Warning: Made in a facility that processes: eggs. Contains Bioengineered Food Ingredients.

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: INTRA-WORKOUT
products.infoParagraph: Immerse yourself in the power of RULE INTRA, where essential amino acids and superior hydration merge for ultimate endurance and performance. Our innovative blend supports your body throughout your training.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Intra Performance Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: Take one serving of RULE with 6-8 ounces of water or your preferred beverage. Consume it either during or after your workout on training days, or at any time throughout the day to stay well-hydrated. For optimal outcomes, blend two servings of RULE in 10-12 ounces of water

factTitles.title: OTHER INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Citric Acid, Natural and Artificial Flavors, Malic Acid, Silicon Dioxide, Sucralose, Acesulfame Potassium,Maltodextrin.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Allergy Warning: Contains tree nuts (Coconut). Made using equipment that handles milk, peanuts, wheat, and soy.

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: WHEY PROTEIN
products.infoParagraph: Up your protein game with RULE WHEY, a premium whey protein powder. Packed with quality nutrients, it's the ideal choice for fueling your fitness journey and achieving your strength goals.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Whey Strength Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: Consume a single daily serving of 30 grams, equivalent to 3/4 of a scoop, by blending it with 250ml of water. This consumption is recommended post-workout on training days, and alternatively, at any point during the day on rest days.

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Instant Whey Proteins 86% {Whey Protein Concentrate (Milk) [Emulsifier: Lecithins (Soy)], Whey Protein Isolate (Milk) [Emulsifier: Lecithins (Soy)]}, Flavourings, Taurine 3.3%, Salt 2%, L-Arginine 1.7%, L-Glutamine 1.7%, Colour (Ammonia Caramel), Thickener (Xanthan Gum), L-Leucine 0.3%, Sweeteners (Sucralose, Acesulfame K), Anti-Caking Agent (Silicon Dioxide), Bromelain from Pineapple 0.07% (1200 GDU/g), Papain from Papaya 0.07% (1.5 FIP U/mg).

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Allergy Warning: Contains milk and soy ingredients. Manufactured in a facility that also processes eggs, wheat, peanuts, and tree nuts.

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: HYDROLYZED ISOLATE
products.infoParagraph: Introducing our RULE HYDROLYZED ISOLATE, a cutting-edge protein supplement. With rapid absorption and unmatched purity, it's the pinnacle of protein supplementation, ensuring you get the most out of every scoop.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Hydrolyzed Isolate Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: consume one serving (1 scoop) of RULE ISO, which provides 25 grams of protein, either after your workout on training days or at any time during the day on rest days. Mix the serving with 250ml of water for optimal absorption.

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Hydrolyzed Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Isolate, Cocoa Powder (Processed with Alkali), Natural and Artificial Flavors, Less Than 1% Of: Salt, Soy Lecithin, Sucralose.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Allergy Warning: Contains milk and soy ingredients. Store in a cool, dry place. Contains Bioengineered food ingredient. keep out of reach of Children.

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: TAKE OFF
products.infoParagraph: Get ready for a boost of energy with TAKE OFF, our energizing drink. Perfect for a quick pick-me-up, this beverage is your go-to for a refreshing lift whenever you need it.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Take Off Power Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: We recommend a maximum consumption of 1 can (500ml) per day. To be served chilled!

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Carbonated Water, Malic Acid, CarnoSyn Beta-Alanine, L-Citrulline, BetaPower Betaine Anhydrous, Potassium Sorbate (Preservative), Caffeine Anhydrous, Sucralose, Acesulfame Potassium, Natural & Artificial Flavors, Sodium Citrate, Niacinamide, N-Acetyl-L-Tyrosine, Potassium Phosphate, Cyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12).

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Do Not Consume this Product if You are  Pregnant or Nursing. Not Intended for Children. Recommended for Adults. Store in a Cool, Dry Place. Do Not Freeze.

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: BCAA DRINK
products.infoParagraph: Revitalize with our BCAA carbonated drink, packed with BCAAs and essential B-vitamins. It's a great way to stay hydrated while supporting muscle recovery - a refreshing and replenishing choice.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior BCAA Pump & Vitamins Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: We recommend a maximum consumption of 2 cans per day. Best served chilled! Once opened, consume same day.

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: Carbonated Water, L-Leucine, Citric Acid, L-Valine, L-Isoleucine, Natural Flavors, Carrot Concentrate for Color, Caffeine, Sucralose, Green Tea-Extract, Beta Carotene for Color, Niacin, Vitamin B6, Biotin, Vitamin B12.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Not recommended for children, pregnant or breast-feeding women or individuals sensitive to caffeine.

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.

products.name: AGMATINE
products.infoParagraph: Elevate your workout with RULE AGMATINE, a powerhouse supplement. Designed to support endurance and muscle performance, it's the secret weapon for pushing your limits.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior AGMATINE Pump & Recovery Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: Combine one (1) serving with 4-6oz of water or blend it with your preferred pre-workout drink 20 minutes before your training session. For optimal outcomes, consider incorporating an extra serving while training.

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: 100% Agmatine Sulfate Powder

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Prior to using this product, consult your physician if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medications, under 18 years of age, or have a medical condition. Cease usage two weeks prior to any scheduled surgery.

products.smallNote: Store this product in a cool dry place, away from children. Do not exceed suggested use.

products.name: L-GLUTAMINE POWDER
products.infoParagraph: Fuel your recovery with RULE L-GLUTAMINE POWDER, a vital amino acid. Perfect for post-workout replenishment, it aids in muscle repair, ensuring you bounce back stronger after each session.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior L-GLUTAMINE Post-Workout Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: Consume 1 serving (5g) one to three times daily during meals. For optimal outcomes, take 1 serving after your training session with water or juice.

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: 100% Micronized L-Glutamine.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Check with a qualified health professional before using this product if you are under the age of 18, pregnant or nursing a baby or if you have any known or suspected medical condition(s) and or are taking any prescription or OTC medication(s). Not to be used as a substitute for a varied diet and healthy lifestyle.

products.smallNote: Store this product in a cool dry place, away from children. Do not exceed suggested use.

products.name: CITRULLINE MALATE
products.infoParagraph: Boost your exercise capacity with RULE CITRULLINE MALATE, a performance-enhancing supplement. Tailored for endurance, it promotes efficient oxygen delivery to muscles, keeping you at your peak during workouts
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Citrulline Malate Endurance Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: Begin by pouring your chosen quantity of water or fruit juice into our shaker. Following this, add precisely 7 1/2 mini-scoops, each measuring 2 grams. Thoroughly shake the contents before consumption. This regimen is recommended for use 1-2 times daily.

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: 100% Citrulline Malate powder.

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: lease adhere to the suggested daily dosage. This product is not intended to substitute a varied and balanced diet. Suitable for Vegetarians.

products.smallNote: Store this product in a cool dry place, away from children. Do not exceed suggested use.

products.name: CREATINE MONOHYDRATE
products.infoParagraph: Unleash strength and power with CREATINE MONOHYDRATE, a proven muscle-building supplement. Ideal for enhancing performance, it's your ally for achieving maximum gains in the gym.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Creatine Monohydrate Gains Blend.

factTitles.title: RECOMMENDED DOSAGE
factTitles.paragraph: Incorporate 1 scoop (3g) of the product with 150-250ml of water, subsequently shaking and consuming the mixture. Employ this regimen once daily, either before or after engaging in exercise.

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: 100% Creatine Monohydrate (Creapure)

factTitles.title: WARNINGS & OTHER INFO
factTitles.paragraph: Please do not exceed the suggested daily dosage. This product is not meant to be used as a substitute for a diverse, well-balanced diet. The beneficial effect comes from consuming 3g of creatine daily during consecutive phases of short, high-intensity physical activity. Suitable for Vegans and Vegetarians.

products.smallNote: Store this product in a cool dry place, away from children. Do not exceed suggested use.

products.name: RULE OATS
products.infoParagraph: Power up your morning with RULE OATS, our premium protein porridge - a delicious, protein-rich delight for when you're on the go.
products.bigText: Unleash Peak Performance with Our Superior Rule Oats Protein Porridge Blend.

factTitles.title: SUGGESTED USE - OPTION 1:
factTitles.paragraph: Remove lid and add 150ml of boiling water. Stir well and leave for 1-2 minutes. Eat and ENJOY!

factTitles.title: SUGGESTED USE - OPTION 2:
factTitles.paragraph: Add 100ml of cold water or milk and stir well. To add heat, place into the microwave for 30 seconds. Stir again, ENJOY!

factTitles.title: INGREDIENTS
factTitles.paragraph: 100% Organic Wholegrain Oat Flakes, Whey Protein Concentrate (Emulsifier Soy Lecithin) Milk Whey Protein Isolate, Medium Chain Triglyceride (MCT Powder), Natural Flavouring, Thickener (Xanthan Gum) Sweetener (Sucralose), Natural Sweetener (Stevia).

products.smallNote: Some Ingredients & values may differ per Flavour.
